[DQC.US.0081.9277] The line item concept us-gaap:CostOfPropertyRepairsAndMaintenance with a value of 126,401 is represented as a child of us-gaap:OperatingExpenses with a value of 748,683 in the companies extension taxonomy role 00000004 - Statement - Consolidated Statements of Operations. The element us-gaap:CostOfPropertyRepairsAndMaintenance however, is not represented as a component of us-gaap:OperatingExpenses in the calculation relationships defined in the US GAAP taxonomy. The US-GAAP taxonomies include us-gaap:CostOfPropertyRepairsAndMaintenance as a sibling element (or child of that sibling) relative to us-gaap:OperatingExpenses in the calculation relationships of the US GAAP taxonomy. Please review the element selection to determine that an appropriate element has been used for the parent element us-gaap:OperatingExpenses and the child element us-gaap:CostOfPropertyRepairsAndMaintenance.
The properties of this us-gaap:CostOfPropertyRepairsAndMaintenance fact are:
Period :2022-01-01 to 2022-12-31 Dimensions : Unit : USD
Rule Element Id:9277 Rule version: 22.0.0RC1 - http://www.sec.gov/Archives/edgar/data/59860/000119983523000348/grmc-10k.htm 5851
